stories.fantasy_headline: Sky-Wizards Discover Betelgeuse's Hidden Twin Star!
stories.fantasy_story: For many years, the great crimson star Betelgeuse behaved oddly. Now, master sky-wizards, using the Grand Seeing Orb, have found its secret! A smaller, hidden celestial twin carves a shimmering path through the giant star's vast atmosphere, explaining its strange dances in the night sky.

stories.fantasy_headline: Sky-Wizards Uncover Starless Ghost Nebula of Shadow Essence!
stories.fantasy_story: Using the Grand Seeing Orb, the Loremasters of the Stars have revealed a phantom nebula named Cloud-9. This cosmic wraith is woven purely from unseen shadow essence, holding no twinkling stars. It appears to be a sky-isle from creation's dawn that never bloomed, confirming ancient theories.

stories.fantasy_headline: Great Merchant Guild Plans Sprawling Bazaar Near Windgale!
stories.fantasy_story: The Great Merchant Guild of the Amazon plans a vast new trading hub. This colossal market bazaar, approved by the Town Elders of Oakhaven, will span thirty-five acres. It promises endless trading stalls and countless wares, a truly grand mercantile center for all to visit.
